Launch the HAIgermany Shiny App

Source: R/run_app.R
run_HAIgermany_app.Rd

This function launches the interactive Shiny application included in the HAIgermany package. The app allows users to explore healthcare-associated infections (HAIs) in Germany, filter by infection type and age group, and visualize McCabe score distributions interactively.

Usage

run_HAIgermany_app()

Value

Runs the Shiny app in a new window.

Details

The app requires an interactive R session (e.g., RStudio or R GUI). It automatically opens in a browser or the RStudio Viewer pane. If the app directory cannot be found, an error is thrown suggesting reinstallation.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
if (interactive()) {
  run_HAIgermany_app()
}
} # }
